sentences.en: a general who was infamous for his brutality
sentences.cn: 因残忍而恶名昭彰的将军

sentences.en: Bronka is somewhat infamous for his screeching electric guitar work.
sentences.cn: 布朗卡因为弹出刺耳的电吉他声而有些让人讨厌。

sentences.en: Did she show that infamous letter to you?
sentences.cn: 她给你看了那封不名誉的信了 吗 ?

sentences.en: He sighed for the galleys, with their infamous costume.
sentences.cn: 他羡慕那些穿着囚衣的苦工.

sentences.en: He was infamous for his anti-feminist attitudes.
sentences.cn: 他因反对女性主义而声名狼藉。
他对自己的卑鄙的行为至今仍无悔过的表现.

sentences.en: I have sent a cable describing the wickedness of that infamous organization.
sentences.cn: 我发了个电报,报道了那个臭名昭彰的组织的罪恶.

sentences.en: I said two or three amusing things and Mr. Holder made a few infamous puns.
sentences.cn: 我讲了两、三件有趣的小事,霍尔德先生说了几句不很高明的双关语.

sentences.en: I was shocked by her infamous behavior.
sentences.cn: 我对她不名誉的行为大为震惊.

sentences.en: I was shocked by her infamous behaviour.
sentences.cn: 她的无耻行径令我震惊.

sentences.en: I wondered now as I sat down beside him what infamous thing Tom had done.
sentences.cn: 我在他身旁坐下,猜想汤姆准是又干了什么声名狼籍的丑事了.

sentences.en: In the meantime, there was no doubt of one thing; they kept an infamous bad watch.
sentences.cn: 不过, 有一点是毫无疑问的: 他们的警戒工作安排得太糟了.
恶名远播的洛杉矶雾霾

sentences.en: Oh, if God made me suffer like that it's infamous.
sentences.cn: ?蹋〖热簧系凼刮夷茄?受苦,他就是无耻的.

sentences.en: She was to drink some of this infamous mixture.
sentences.cn: 她将喝这种难喝的混合液.

sentences.en: The infamous traitor was sentenced to death.
sentences.cn: 那个罪大恶极的叛徒被判处死刑.

trans.tran_cn: 声名狼藉的，无耻的，伤风败俗的，[法]（因犯重罪）被剥夺公权的，很差的，低劣的
trans.tran_en: well known for being bad or evil
